variant.value: Caregiver or CHW Involved in case:
(What is the primary reason for current visit?
Uburwayi bw’Imbamutima iri hejuru cyane(Ibyishimo birenze by’uburwayi)
Kumva ko ibintu byagenda uko ashaka
Uburwayi bwo mu mutwe bugaragarira ku bimenyetso by’umubiri
Has the patient experienced any OLD signs
Ese umurwayi yakomeje kugaragaza ibimenyetso by’uburwayi muri uku kwezi gushize
Niba ari yego,Garagaza bimwe muri byo
Any NEW signs/symptoms of their mental illness in the past month
Any NEW signs/symptoms of their mental illness in the past month
Is the patient exhibiting any Extrapyramidal Symptoms (EPS)
Ese haba hari ingaruka mbi z’imiti zihariye ku gice cy’ubwonko kigenga imikorere y’ingingo z’umubiri
Uburwayi bwo kugagara ingingo ugahora utitirira aho uri
Gusa nuremaye ingongo biza nyuma y’igihe ufata imiti
Is the patient being given medication for EPS
Ese umurwayi yahawe imiti ivura ingaruka mbi z’imiti
Is the patient experiencing overall improvement of symptoms
Ese muri rusange umurwayi aroroherwa/ibimenyetso biragabanuka
Is the patient being internally referred
Ese umurwayi yoherejwe kwivuza mu yindi serivisi iba mu bitaro
If Yes, where is the patient being referred to
Niba ari yego yoherejwe mu yihe serivise
Why is the patient being referred
Ni iyihe mpamvu yatumye umurwayi yoherejwe kwivuza mu yindi serivisi
Is this a permanent change of IMB Mental Health Home?/(Need clarification-Does it mean dischargment/permanent exit from MH clinic )
Is this a permanent change of IMB Mental Health Home?/(Need clarification-Does it mean dischargment/permanent exit from MH clinic )

section.headerCode: Mental Status Exam / Ikizamini ku buzima bwo mu mutwe

lookup.expression: fn.message('Any NEW signs/symptoms of their mental illness in the past month')
